query:
UPDATE reasoning_patterns SET
                    use_count = use_count + 1,
                    success_count = success_count + 1,
                    success_rate = CAST(success_count + 1 AS REAL) / CAST(use_count + 1 AS REAL),
                    cost_savings_usd = cost_savings_usd + COALESCE(?, 0),
                    last_used = ?,
                    updated_at = ?
                WHERE id = ?
